Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
obsessional \obsessional\ obsessive \obsessive\adj. Persistently and abnormally preoccupied with some unreasonable idea.
Syn: compulsive. [WordNet 1.5]
obsessive adj : characterized by or constituting an obsession; "the obsessional character of his response"; "obsessive gambling" [syn: {obsessional}]
